content: Please see the updated C-CDA Scorecard Release 2.0 at www.healthit.gov/scorecard

Matt Rahn said:

Please see the updated C-CDA Scorecard Release 2.0 at www.healthit.gov/scorecard

Updates included in the C-CDA Scorecard Release 2.0:
Support the latest rubrics/new Scorecard rules developed over the past year
Support CURES validation within the Scorecard
Update UI
